item.title: A place for my head
item.description: Hi Stranger, welcome to my echo chamber. Here I will periodically dump my observations/experiences of various topics, not necessarily limited to tech. Hopefully, it will be a mutually beneficial use of our limited time and helps to further expand our ever-growing knowledge.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi Stranger, welcome to my echo chamber. I am Abhishek, more commonly known as stark in online communities. Professionally I am a Linux system engineer with a wide variety of interests. In my free time, I like to tinker with microcontrollers/electronics, practice guitar riffs, learn languages.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Got something interesting to talk about ? Let’s connect: Email: hellobrainlog@gmail.com Keybase: https://keybase.io/abhx GitHub: https://git.io/stark
